data.title: List of defunct airlines of the United Kingdom
data.text:

operations Ceased

operations Notes A Avro Transport Company 1919 1920 First regular airline in the UK[3] A2B Airways 2005 2006 Established as Flykeen Airways. Acquired by British NorthWest Airlines AB Airlines 7L AZX AZTEC 1993 1999 Entered administration AB Shannon 1995 1996 Established as Air Bristol in 1993.
